name: Bombfall (beaninator)
description:
Defend the precious almighty bean from an endless swarm of falling bombs.

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. This game marks the first time I have participated in one.

I'm still a beginner with game dev in general so as a result this game will definitely not be the best. That being said, I did learn quite a lot.

Made in Pygame, a library for the programming language Python.

Defend your bean from 3 different bombs: 

1. Basic - nothing interesting.

2. Fast - moves faster.

3 Armored - takes three hits to destroy.

Credits:

-Art: Done by me, I'm no artist so it may not look the best.

-Programming: Done by me.

-Sound Design: Done by me.

Lastly, this project is far from where I wanted it to be. That being said, I hope this little game give you some level of enjoyment. Any feedback would be appreciated, Thanks!
